attributes.additional_details:
E scooters are dangerous and used irresponsibly by their users on most occasions. 
They must be banned to keep our pavements safe.
attributes.background: Ban e scooters on pavements and enforce severe fines for those who do and / or community service.

rejection.details:
Currently the only e-scooters it is legal to use on public roads are those that are part of local rental trials. The use of privately owned e-scooters on public roads is already illegal. If you want the Government to stop the local e-scooter trials, we could accept a petition requesting this.

Decisions about investigating and prosecuting alleged crimes, including traffic offences involving e-scooters, are a matter for the police and Crown Prosecution Service, not the Government or Parliament.
